# File lib/gherkin/tools/reformat.rb, line 8
      def run
        each do |file|
          purdy = StringIO.new
          listener = Formatter::PrettyFormatter.new(purdy)
          scan(file, listener)
          purdy.rewind
          File.open(file, 'w') {|io| io.write(purdy.read)}
        end
      end
